Test Name: JC Virus Detection by In Situ Hybridization
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or blocks
Purpose: To detect and localize JC Virus DNA within tissue sections for diagnosing progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy and other JC Virus-related conditions.
Container: FFPE tissue block or unstained, positively charged glass slide
Equipment: Microtome, incubator with humidity control, hybridization oven, water bath, light microscope
